citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55pm on April 2,
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone (left a voicemail message) and in person, and through an
individual at the premises that was able to reach her by phone but was not authorized by the licensee to serve as a
representative during an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55pm on April 2, 
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone (left a voicemail message) and in person, and through an 
individual at the premises that was able to reach her by phone but was not authorized by the licensee to serve as a 
representative during an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
